amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of the text of the amendments, as modified, printed on pages H5427-5428 in the Congressional Record for May 17, 2007.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: Amendments nos. 2, as modified, 3, 6, 7, 11, 20, and 31 printed in the Congressional Record.

action.text: Frank (MA) amendment (A006) modified by unanimous consent. Amendment no. 2 modified
On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendments (A006) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
